name: PositiveQuoteofTheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Quotes from a variety of personalities and from various time periods. From authors to entrepreneurs, start your day right by listening to your daily motivational briefing. 

"Magic: it was what happened when the mind met the world, and the mind won for a change." (Lev Grossman)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
